function_description: Save changes to the profile details.
initial_state: The user is on the profile settings page with all desired changes made in the respective fields.
steps: Review all the changes made to ensure they are correct.
Locate the 'Save' button at the bottom of the page.
Click the 'Save' button to apply all changes.
expected_state: All changes to the profile picture, name, phone number, and organization details are saved successfully. The updated information is reflected in the profile settings page.
